head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BURKE, PHILIP JOHN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BURKE, PHILIP JOHN

block.p: BURKE-Philip John, former sports writer, Age 65, of Millville, DE, died Wednesday, Aug. 23, 2000 at his residence. A visitation will be held at Parsell Funeral Homes & Crematorium, Atkins-Lodge Chapel, 1449 Kings Highway, Lewes on Sunday, August 27, 2000 from 6-8 PM. Mass of Christian Burial will be held at St. Anne's Catholic Church, Rt. 26, Bethany Beach, DE., at 11:00 A.M., on Monday, August 28, 2000. Burial will be at the Delaware Veterans Memorial Cemetery South, Millsboro, DE. Contributions are suggested to the Delaware Hospice, Southern Division, S. DuPont Highway, Georgetown, DE 19947
